title: Omega Chi Epsilon
text: Purdue University Chemical Engineering Honor Society

title: Omega Chi Epsilon
text:
About Us
Omega Chi Epsilon (ΟΧΕ) is the National Honor Society for Chemical Engineering students. Our chapter promotes excellence in chemical engineering through scholarship, leadership, service, and character.

title: Synopsis
Synopsis
text:
Our Purpose

Promote high scholarship
Encourage original investigation in chemical engineering
Recognize character, integrity, and leadership
Advocate and support community service

title: Synopsis
text:
Chapter Values



Character
We value strong moral character and ethical behavior in all our members.




Integrity
Integrity is at the core of our academic and professional pursuits.




Leadership
We encourage leadership and initiative in service to the community.
